title: Akshay Kumar spends holiday with his ‘little princess’
text: Akshay Kumar spends holiday with his ‘little princess’ Friday, 23 October 2015 (14 minutes ago) Akshay Kumar is off for a holiday with his wife Twinkle Khanna and his daughter Nitara, who he refers as a “little princess”. Mumbai, Oct 23 : It's family time for Akshay Kumar! The actor, who has been shooting for director duo Sajid-Farhad's upcoming comedy film "Housefull 3" in... newKerala.com 2 hours ago - Entertainment New Delhi, Oct.23 : Bollywood actor Akshay Kumar is enjoying some quality time with his daughter Nitara during the family holiday. newKerala.com 2 hours ago - Entertainment The actor manages to yet again share a beautiful picture, hiding the face of his daughter!
